statements: UPDATE survey_results SET response = 'Yes' WHERE respondent_id = 123 AND survey_name = 'Satisfaction Survey';

UPDATE survey_results SET response='Agree' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE survey_results SET submission_date=NOW(), question_text='How satisfied are you with the service?' WHERE respondent_id=5;
UPDATE survey_results SET response='Great feedback!' WHERE survey_id=1;
UPDATE stakeholders SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE stakeholder_id=3;
UPDATE survey_results SET response = 'Great feedback!' WHERE survey_id = 1;

UPDATE survey_results SET question1 = 'What is your favorite color?' WHERE survey_id = 1;

UPDATE survey_responses SET response_text = 'Excellent service, highly satisfied!' WHERE response_id = 5;
UPDATE survey_results SET respondent_name='John Doe' WHERE survey_id=1;
UPDATE survey_responses SET answer='Yes' WHERE response_id=3;
